analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/13/0x96e9f45a47be8e3e5eb395394c7e28b73aa931ac.sol:
	Contract DAEChainToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/13/0x96e9f45a47be8e3e5eb395394c7e28b73aa931ac.sol#217)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/13/0x96e9f45a47be8e3e5eb395394c7e28b73aa931ac.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
